General_Description: '''Paint the Land Red''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] [[Athenian army|militaries]] pose too great a threat across the [[Greece|Greek world]]."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Athenian [[soldier]]s throughout Greece, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Weeding Out Athenian Forces]] and [[Wrecking Athenian Forces]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
